c74object.name: bach.prime
c74object.description: Returns 1 if the input number is prime, 0 otherwise.

inlet.digest: Number to be tested for primality

method.name: bang
method.description: The result of the last primality test performed is returned.

method.name: float
method.description: A float is converted to an int, and the primality test is performed.

method.name: int
method.description: The primality test is performed on the integer. If a negative number is input, the test is performed on its opposite. Even in 64-bit mode, the primality test can be performed only on numbers up to 2147483647.

c74object.discussion: Even in 64-bit mode, the primality test can be performed only on numbers up to 2147483647.

entry.name: Inlet 1 (int)
entry.description: Number to be tested for primality.

entry.name: More details
entry.description: Even in 64-bit mode, the primality test can be performed only on numbers up to 2147483647.
